name: Scrap Den 40.000
description:
Scrap Den 40000 is a game about shooting, where you don't control the weapons nor your character.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only rust.

It is the 41st millenium. For more than a hundred centuries, humanity has vanished, with only the sturdiest of robots surviving. 
Afflicted with a rare disease that makes him a killing machine, b0L0-t4 must journey to the only place where the cure could be found - the Scrap Den. A retreat to only the vilest of rust buckets, but alas, a treasure cove of mechanical parts. Armed with only his willpower and a bursting deadly arsenal, will b0l0-t4 find the parts required to reverse his condition?

There is no peace among the stars, only an eternity of carnage and slaughter.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By Augusto kerber, Paulo Scabeni and Victor Caramez
Made in under 48h for GMTKJam 2020 - Out of Control
